exceptions.exn: The LHS of PSeries_0 (PSeries _ 0) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rmult_1_l (1 * _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment a : nat -> R x : R H : a 0%nat = 0 Unable to unify "x * PSeries (PS_decr_1 a) x" with "0 + x * PSeries (PS_decr_1 a) x".

original: intros H. rewrite PSeries_decr_1. rewrite H. simpl. rewrite PSeries_0. rewrite Rmult_1_l. reflexivity.
